mapper.insert: insert into app_version (id, version, device_type, created_time, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into app_version
id,
version,
device_type,
created_time,
updated_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update app_version
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from app_version where device_type=#{deviceType} group by created_time desc limit 0,1;
